entry.title: Posting type D should allow material number
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I have the requirement, that the posting type D of pruchase order should allow material number. 

I found the view V_T163Y, but I have no option to edit the settings here. I also talked with my basis team, but they couldn't find any authorization object that allows changes to be made.

Does anyone know why or know a other option to solve my requirement?

Thanks

entry.title: üßµCL_SALV_TABLE ‚Äî Sele√ß√£o com ROW_COLUMN n√£o mant√©m refer√™ncia na impress√£o
entry.content:
üí° Dica √∫til

üí•Ocorreu ap√≥s a migra√ß√£o ECC / S4 üí•

Hoje me deparei com um comportamento curioso usando SET_SELECTION_MODE( IF_SALV_C_SELECTION_MODE=>ROW_COLUMN ) no CL_SALV_TABLE. Ao tentar imprimir as linhas selecionadas com:

lo_selections = o_alv->get_selections( ).
lt_rows = lo_selections->get_selected_rows( ).


"Notei que a refer√™ncia da sele√ß√£o se perdia ap√≥s o usu√°rio clicar em 'Imprimir' e, depois, executar alguma rotina que dependia da sele√ß√£o de linhas. As linhas selecionadas n√£o eram preservadas como esperado. Testei trocar para:"

SET_SELECTION_MODE( IF_SALV_C_SELECTION_MODE=>MULTIPLE )

üü¢ Troquei para MULTIPLE e resolveu! As linhas selecionadas passaram a ser capturadas certinho na impress√£o. Fica a dica: se voc√™ precisa garantir que a sele√ß√£o funcione como esperado, esse modo √© muito mais confi√°vel.
‚ö†Ô∏è Vale lembrar que a CL_SALV_TABLE n√£o tem suporte direto pra capturar colunas selecionadas ‚Äî diferente da CL_GUI_ALV_GRID, que d√° bem mais controle nesse ponto. Ent√£o, se voc√™ precisa dessa precis√£o, talvez seja hora de considerar a migra√ß√£o.
Algu√©m a√≠ j√° passou por isso? Encontrou alguma solu√ß√£o criativa ou outro caminho pra contornar? Compartilha a√≠!

entry.title: üßµCL_SALV_TABLE ‚Äî Lost selection reference when printing using ROW_COLUMN
entry.content:
‚ÄúProblem occurred after ECC/S4 migration.

Today I ran into a strange behavior while using SET_SELECTION_MODE( IF_SALV_C_SELECTION_MODE=>ROW_COLUMN ) in CL_SALV_TABLE. When trying to print selected rows using:

 

lo_selections = o_alv->get_selections( ).

lt_rows = lo_selections->get_selected_rows( ).

üö® I noticed that the selection reference was lost ‚Äî selected columns weren‚Äôt preserved as expected. I switched to:

 

SET_SELECTION_MODE( IF_SALV_C_SELECTION_MODE=>MULTIPLE )

 

üü¢ That did the trick! The selected rows were printed correctly, even when using the Quartz theme (which doesn‚Äôt visually show the selection column). So here‚Äôs the tip: if you need reliable selection tracking, the MULTIPLE mode is much more stable.

üîç Unfortunately, CL_SALV_TABLE doesn‚Äôt offer a way to retrieve selected columns like CL_GUI_ALV_GRID does. If you need that level of detail, it might be worth considering a migration.

Has anyone else faced this? Got workarounds to share? Let‚Äôs talk! üí¨

 

Se quiser posso transformar isso num carrossel pra LinkedIn ou formatar com visuais. S√≥ dar o toque, Felipe! üë®‚Äçüíªüí°

entry.title: Blog: Managing Master Inspection Charactersitics (MICs) through ABAP
entry.content:
This post is still a work in progress...


In this blog post I will post an overview of how to manage MICs through an ABAP program
There are no dedicated BAPIs for MIC handling.

The FM 'BAPI_QPMK_SAVEREPLICA' will be used instead of various BAPIs to Create, Change and Delete MICs

Creating new MIC

Use FM 'BAPI_QPMK_SAVEREPLICA'
Input tables: 

  • MSTCHA (Master Characteristic Data)
    Key data for the MIC:
    • FUNCTION: Set to '009' for creating new MIC
    • PLANT_QPMK: Plant that MIC should be associated with
    • MSTR_CHAR: The Master Characteristic Number you want to be associated with the new MIC. 
      Find the number range setting in SPRO IMG ‚Üí Quality Management ‚Üí Quality Planning ‚Üí Basic Data ‚Üí Inspection Characteristic ‚Üí Define Number Ranges. If a number range is maintained as internal then you can leave this field blank and that number range will be used. Otherwise use FM 'NUMBER_GET_NEXT' for object 'QMERKNR' and provide the interval key maintained in SNRO. 
    • VMSTR_CHAR: Version nr, set as '000001' for new MIC
    • VALID_FROM: Set as desired
    • QLOESCHKZ: Release status of MIC. Set as '2' for "released". Set as '1' for "Being created" if you do not want to release MIC immediately.
    • QVOLLST: Copy Model/Reference Characteristic. Initial for "Incomplete Copy Model", '1' for "Complete copy model" and 'X' for "Reference characteristic".
    • IND_CONTROL: This field represents the Characteristic Control Indicator selections. I have not found definitive documentation for how to de-/encode this field. I recommend having a template MIC and copying the corresponding QPMK-STEUERKZ field. 
  • MSTCHA_TEXT
    Text data for the MIC:
    • PLANT_QPMK; Provide the same plant as in the Key structure
    • MSTR_CHAR: Provide the same Master Characteristic Number as in the Key structure. If using an internal number range, you must pre-allocate it by calling the 'NUMBER_GET_NEXT' FM (OBJECT = 'QMERKMALE', SUBOBJECT = <plant>, NR_RANGE_NR = '<your internal interval>'). Remember to apply CONVERSION_EXIT_ALPHA_INPUT.
    • VMSTR_CHAR: Provide the same version as in the Key structure
    • VALID_FROM: Provide the same valid from as in the Key structure
    • LANGU/LANGU_ISO: Provide the language that they text should be active for or leave blank for system language.
    • CHAR_DESCR: Provide short text
    • IND_MST_CHA_LTEXT: Flag whether long text exists

entry.title: TMG Event 01: Error message in FORM on_save_change not showing immediately on screen
entry.content:
image_1image_2Hi expert, this is my sap abap code which i use to maintain event on table maintainance generator. In this code I have create a form on_save_change to handle event 01: Before saving the data in the database. In on_save_change form, i have create 2 code to validate email duplicate and empty key field value. But whenever i tried to test these two test case, the system always exit and then it show the message outside. Please give me detailed solution

FORM on_save_changes.

  FIELD-SYMBOLS: <fs_field> TYPE any.

  " Existing loop to update audit fields for changed records
  LOOP AT total.
    CHECK <action> EQ aendern.
    ASSIGN COMPONENT 'AENAM' OF STRUCTURE <vim_total_struc> TO <fs_field>.
    IF sy-subrc = 0.
      <fs_field> = sy-uname.
    ENDIF.
    ASSIGN COMPONENT 'AEDAT' OF STRUCTURE <vim_total_struc> TO <fs_field>.
    IF sy-subrc = 0.
      <fs_field> = sy-datum.
    ENDIF.
    ASSIGN COMPONENT 'AEZET' OF STRUCTURE <vim_total_struc> TO <fs_field>.
    IF sy-subrc = 0.
      <fs_field> = sy-uzeit.
    ENDIF.
    READ TABLE extract WITH KEY <vim_xtotal_key>.
    IF sy-subrc = 0.
      extract = total.
      MODIFY extract INDEX sy-tabix.
    ENDIF.
    MODIFY total.
  ENDLOOP.

  " Check for duplicate EMAIL_ADDRESS
  DATA: lt_email TYPE HASHED TABLE OF string WITH UNIQUE KEY table_line,
        lv_email_lower TYPE string.
  FIELD-SYMBOLS: <fs_email> TYPE zsap03_email-email_address.

  LOOP AT total.
    ASSIGN COMPONENT 'EMAIL_ADDRESS' OF STRUCTURE <vim_total_struc> TO <fs_email>.
    IF sy-subrc = 0 AND <fs_email> IS NOT INITIAL.
      lv_email_lower = to_lower( <fs_email> ).
      READ TABLE lt_email WITH KEY table_line = lv_email_lower TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS.
      IF sy-subrc = 0.
        MESSAGE e022(zsap03_msg_cl) WITH <fs_email>.
      ELSE.
        INSERT lv_email_lower INTO TABLE lt_email.
      ENDIF.
    ENDIF.
  ENDLOOP.

" Check for empty key fields (assuming group 'KEY' corresponds to key fields)
  DATA: lt_fieldinfo TYPE TABLE OF dfies,
        ls_fieldinfo TYPE dfies.

  CALL FUNCTION 'DDIF_FIELDINFO_GET'
    EXPORTING
      tabname        = 'ZSAP03_EMAIL'
    TABLES
      dfies_tab      = lt_fieldinfo
    EXCEPTIONS
      not_found      = 1
      internal_error = 2
      OTHERS         = 3.

  IF sy-subrc = 0.
    LOOP AT lt_fieldinfo INTO ls_fieldinfo WHERE keyflag = 'X'.
      LOOP AT total.
        ASSIGN COMPONENT ls_fieldinfo-fieldname OF STRUCTURE <vim_total_struc> TO <fs_field>.
        IF sy-subrc = 0 AND <fs_field> IS INITIAL.
          MESSAGE e111(zsap03_msg_cl) WITH ls_fieldinfo-fieldname.
        ENDIF.
      ENDLOOP.
    ENDLOOP.
  ENDIF.

ENDFORM.

entry.title: To have Dropdown and Input field in ALV TREE OR in Hierarchical ALV output
entry.content:
Hi Friends,

My requirement is to display multiple nodes or an hierarchical grid display by extending the 1st node or the line to have the corresponding item data. 

It can be achieved by using cl_gui_alv_tree. But my requirement is to allow user to edit and select new values from the dropdown. As I understood, it can be achieved only in cl_gui_alv_grid whereas it won't have the hierarchical or multiple node extension view.

Below thread shows the alv field with input and dropdown and a resolve answer but not having more details for my understanding.

https://community.sap.com/t5/application-development-and-automation-discussions/dropdown-and-input-field-in-alv-tree/m-p/10528246

The image appears in the above link looks same for my requirement as well. 

Please provide a solution on achieving an ALV tree or hierarchical view report with an editable and dropdown fields in it.

Thanks for letting me know and appreciate your help.

Regards.

entry.title: Best approach to trigger automatic email notifications for COFC error messages in SAP
entry.content:
Hi experts,

We are currently facing recurring COFC error messages in SAP, such as:

"A master record for 11030211/MACH01 exists only in 2021"

This occurs because the system fails to find valid pricing data for old work centers (e.g., SG20). If these COFC errors are not resolved within the current period, they can affect the accuracy of actual activity costs, delay settlements, and cause production variances.

To prevent recurrence, we are considering setting up automated email notifications when such COFC errors are detected. The requirements are:

  1. Automatically send an email to a designated PIC when a COFC error is triggered.

  2. Email title format:
    "COFC error for company code SG10 Plant SG17 as at <posting date>"

Question:
What is the best approach to implement this auto-email setup in SAP?

  • Is it advisable to use a user-exit, implicit enhancement, or custom background job for detecting COFC errors?

  • Which table(s) or log(s) should be monitored to reliably capture COFC-related messages in real-time or batch?

  • Any recommendations for sending formatted email alerts via ABAP?

Appreciate any advice or examples you can share.

Thank you!

entry.title: Transport Eclipse to another computer
entry.content: Hello community, I have a new computer and I reinstalled Eclipse on it, but I saw that the favorite packages, the project, etc. do not appear even though I logged in with my user. My question is: Is it possible to copy a folder from the previous computer that makes the project, favorites, etc. appear on this one? Thank you in advance.

entry.title: How can extend an exsting Business Partner in the Role TR0151 with Payment details for company codes
entry.content:
We need to load a number of records for Treasury Management in the Business Partner. 

The Business Partners are already created and have the Role TR0151 (Counterparty) assigned. now I need to add in this Role a large number of Payment Details for a large number of company codes. I am thinking of using the Function Module FTB_BUPA_DARK_MAINTAIN_INTERN, but this always gives me either the Error "BP already Exists (When giving the Parameter "Create") or "nochanges Were Made Whe giving the Parameter "02 (Change)

Does anybody have a hint how to solve this, or use a different approach.

entry.title: On pressing create button of item table of object page in RAP it's being navigated to new blank page
entry.content:
Hello Team,

I am new to RAP and trying to create a basic fiori app using RAP with draft action.

I have created sales order header and item table, interface view, projection view and metadata extension to display data on list report and object page.

Now when i perform create action i am succefully able to create header data while pressing create button item table navigation is being done to new page with blank screen and apply button in the footer and when i click on apply it automatically navigates to main object page with one line item available in item table.

Now i have below mentioned questions

1) How i can see the fields in blank sub object page which is displayed on create of item table.

2) Why blank screen is shown.

3) How can i achieve - Table row will be added in item table on press on create button.

I have attached the Txt file which contains Metadata and behaviour definition code and Sales header and item cds consumption view along with screenshots.

entry.title: How to create a checkbox in SAPSCRIPT and see it via print preview
entry.content:

Is there a way to create a checkbox in SAPSCRIPT? My requirement is to create a checkbox, and it will be right beside other columns that are dynamic in record number. Meaning I am passing an internal table from my driver program to my SAPSCRIPT and at the right most column is a checkbox. Have you guys done it before? If yes, how?

Thanks, and hope to hear from you soon.

Newguy

entry.title: How to Hide a Combined Field Group (#AS_FIELDGROUP) by Default in a Fiori Elements List Report
entry.content:
I‚Äôm working on a CDS view where we use the #AS_FIELDGROUP annotation to display a combined field called ‚ÄúPlanned Start / End‚Äù.

 @ui: {
  lineItem: [
  {  hidden: true
  },
      { 
      type: #AS_FIELDGROUP,
        valueQualifier: 'StartEnd',
        label: 'Planned Start / End',
        importance: #LOW
         }
  ],
      fieldGroup: [
      {
      exclude: true,
      qualifier: 'StartEnd',
        position: 10 }]
  }
  @Consumption:{
      filter.hidden: true
       }
       
  MfgOrderPlannedStartEndDate;
    @ui: {
    lineItem: [
    { hidden: true }
    ],
    fieldGroup: [
    {
    qualifier: 'StartEnd',
      position: 20 }] }
  @Consumption:{
    filter.hidden: true
     }
  MfgOrderPlannedEndStartDate;

At the moment, this field is shown by default in the list report, but I‚Äôd like it not to appear by default, while still allowing users to add it manually via Adapt UI (table personalization). I tried using exclude: true, but it didn‚Äôt work as expected.

Do you know if there‚Äôs a way to achieve this behavior? Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Analytical Query: Annotations for Filter by Measure
entry.content:
Hello All, 

I have built a Analytical Query using CDS. I have a requirement to automatically filter out data, which doesn't match specific conditions in few of the Columns(measures).

For eg. assume the condition is to exclude rows wherever Delta is 0

Col1Col2Col3Val1Val2Delta
ABE12-1
ABD220
ACD211
GCE422
GCF330

Depending which Characteristic columns user chooses columns to display, Delta column may result in various values.

Col1Val1Val2Delta
A550
G752
Col3Val1Val2Delta
D431
E541
F330
Col2Col3Val1Val2Delta
BD220
BE12-1
CD211
CE422
CF330

I can achieve this requirement by using "Filter by Measures" at runtime. Is there a way to achieve this via ABAP CDS annotations?

Thank You

Cc: copying some blog authors here for their advice @AndreaUS @joerg_franke @MarkGreen

entry.title: Program not working in Fiori but working in GUI
entry.content:
I have a custom report in SAP which is fetching data based on the selection screen input from vbak table and displaying as ALV. It is working as expected in SAP gui. But when executed on the fiori app with the same inputs, it is not giving any output.  The program contains simple select queries and loops to process data for Sales OTC flow.

Please help!!!

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Error in ABAP Cloud - "The Use of table /SCWM/T340D is not permitted"
entry.content:
I am building a code "ready for cloud" in on premise system and code below is triggering error message "The Use of table /SCWM/T340D is not permitted" -->

METHODS unpack_outer_hu

IMPORTING

is_t340D TYPE /scwm/t340d

is_ltap TYPE /scwm/ltap

EXPORTING

ev_del_level TYPE i.

 Normally it happens when object or table is not released to ABAP Cloud, we are having this error message for several EWM objects, is there any way to release it to ABAP Cloud?

ABAP Cloud EWM - Basis
